thread.title: Birmingham Civil Rights Institute closing temporarily for repairs

title: Birmingham Civil Rights Institute closing temporarily for repairs
text:
Published By: Al.com: Birmingham - Today 
The building will be closed to the public from Tuesday until Monday, Nov. 3, for water infiltration and remediation work....
